column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We wanted to visit Chicago last year but due to the pandemic
column2: we couldn't. So a few days ago
column3: I ordered from Tastes of Chicago and had six 9" deep dish pizzas sent to me in California. I figured even though we weren't able to travel there
column4: at least we could have a taste of what deep dish pizza is like from Chicago.
